text: The Suicide Squad is a fictional supervillain team appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The first version of the Suicide Squad debuted in The Brave and the Bold #25 (September 1959) and the second and modern version, created by John Ostrander. One of the two teams saves the world from a threatening race of savages. == Overview == The team was formed by Amanda Waller. Members of the group are: Captain Boomerang, Deadshot, Enchantress, Harley Quinn, Katana and Killer Croc. == In other media == In 2016, a movie version of the group was made. Another movie, The Suicide Squad, was released in 2021. ==References== Category:DC Comics characters Category:DC Comics adapted into movies
title: Suicide Squad
